# contentInsetsReference

**Instance Property**

The boundary to reference when defining content insets.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var contentInsetsReference: UIContentInsetsReference { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentInsetsReference/safeArea].

## Configuring spacing

- **interSectionSpacing**: The amount of space between the sections in the layout.
- **UIContentInsetsReference**: Constants that describe the reference point of the content insets.
